content: how do i - work a single_crochet decrease a you may do this by two methods one is to simply skip the next stitch this method is good for the ends of row but gives you a choppy appearance the second method is to crochet two stitches together for this demo i have used contrasting colors so you can see what is being done insert hook in next stitch and pull up a loop do not yarn over insert hook in next stitch and pull up a loop you should now have 3 loops on the hook yarn over and pull through all three loops on your hook as you can see the two stitches from the row below are now combined as one decreasing your stitch count by 1 stitch copperscaledragon copperscaledrago ravelry id
